Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.services.media.books.isbn

Class ISBN13

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.services.media.books.isbn.ISBN13
public class ISBN13
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the ISBN13 and contains methods to validate isbn13 und transform isbn10 to isbn13

Author:
Robin Beck, Christoph Frischmuth, Mickey Knop, John Klippstein, Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

    • ISBN13

      public ISBN13​(java.lang.String isbn13) throws InvalidISBNException
      Used to create a new isbn13 from a valid isbn13 string
      Parameters:
      isbn13 - isbn13 string, separated with "-"
      Throws:
      InvalidISBNException - if the given isbn13 is not valid

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      public static boolean isValid​(java.lang.String isbn13)
      Checks whether an ISBN13 is valid or not
      Parameters:
      isbn13 - ISBN13 as String separated by "-"
      Returns:
      true, if the ISBN is valid, fals if not

    • hasValidFormat

      public static boolean hasValidFormat​(java.lang.String isbn13)
      Checks if the format of the ISBN is correct, does not check if the checksum is valid
      Parameters:
      isbn13 - ISBN13 String separated by "-"
      Returns:
      true, if the format is valid, false if not

    • toISBN13

      public static ISBN13 toISBN13​(ISBN10 isbn10) throws InvalidISBNException
      converts an ISBN10 object to an ISBN13 object
      Parameters:
      isbn10 - valid isbn10 object
      Returns:
      isbn13 object
      Throws:
      InvalidISBNException - if the isbn is not valid
